ComicInfo.Title: City At War
ComicInfo.Summary: The Turtles have taken up residence in a large, empty water tower on top of an old New York City building. The guys are restless and directionless without Splinter to guide them, upset by the news reports of escalating street violence between the fractured factions of the Foot Clan. Violence that the TMNT feel responsible for, as it was their actions that lead to the splintering of the Foot. Raph wants to take the fight to the Clan and finish what they began when Leo killed Saki, but Leonardo isn't sure that they need to continue fighting Splinter's blood feud with the Foot for the rest of their lives.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 12:04:21. [CVDB159061] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 18:53:37. [Issue ID 245519]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman,Peter Laird,Jim Lawson,Kevin Eastman,Peter Laird,Jim Lawson
